definition: to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Different parts of anterior cingulate gyrus are correlated with cognitive and emotional aspects of pain.
sentences.chinese: 扣帶回的不同部分調節着痛覺認知和情感的不同方面。

sentences.english: With anterior cingulate and the frontal lobes dysfunction.
sentences.chinese: 同時伴有前扣帶回和前額葉功能不良。

sentences.english: Anterior cingulate Empathy, affect, decision making, cognitive control.
sentences.chinese: 前扣帶回共情，情感，決策，認知控制。
